headline: Here’s Why ClearBridge Large Cap Growth Strategy Chose Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG)
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge Large Cap Growth Strategy” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. The investment philosophy of the strategy is to invest in leading companies that are undervalued by the market in terms of their future growth potential. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here.
